ValidationRule.description: currently same rule as for "awaiting closure" except that Siemens attribution must match EIL attribution
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( EIL_Status__c ,"Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Fleet__c ,"E320"), OR( ISBLANK( Name), ISBLANK( Incident_Date__c), ISBLANK( Incident_Title__c), ISBLANK( Initial_Report__c), ISBLANK( Diagram__c), ISBLANK( Delay_Minutes__c), ISBLANK( Location__c), LEN(Fault_Codes__c) = 0, LEN(EQX_Work_Reports__c) = 0, LEN(Crew_Report_Summary__c) = 0, LEN(Unit_History__c) = 0, ISPICKVAL( Primary_Code__c,""), ISPICKVAL( Secondary_Code__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( Leading_Half_Set__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( Trailing_Half_Set__c ,""), ISBLANK( Root_Cause__c), ISBLANK( Root_Cause_non_technical__c), ISPICKVAL( Avoidable__c,""), LEN(Remedial_Action_Taken__c) = 0, LEN(Recommendations__c) = 0, Inform_Siemens__c=FALSE , ISBLANK(EIL_Lead_Investigator__c), LEN(EIL_Summary_Conclusion__c) = 0, ISBLANK( Siemens_Lead_Investigator__c ), LEN(Siemens_Summary_Conclusion__c) = 0, ISPICKVAL( Siemens_Attribution__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( Reasonable_Time__c ,""), ISPICKVAL( Follow_Up_Actions__c, ""), ISBLANK( Follow_Up_References__c ), ISPICKVAL( Final_Attribution__c ,""), TEXT(Siemens_Attribution__c) != TEXT (Final_Attribution__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure all sections are completed, and select a Follow up Action and a Final Attribution. The Siemens Attribution must match the EIL Attribution
